General.Name: BGT Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: BGT Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the retail of ready-to-wear apparel and related accessories in Thailand. It offers suitcase, wallets, caps, sport products and water recreation products, sport bras, T-shirts, tank tops, polo shirts, leggings, jogging pants, backpacks, traveling bags, socks, men's underwear, rash guards, etc. for men, women, and girls under the Body Glove brand name. The company also sells its products online. BGT Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
